#+TITLE: French Verb Drill: Sound and Movement
#+AUTHOR: Generated by verbiste.el
#+STARTUP: overview

* Introduction

This drill focuses on verbs related to sounds, movements, and physical sensations.
Practice conjugating these verbs in different tenses and using them in sentences.

* Verbs in this group

1. grincer
2. trembler
3. embraser
4. éclater
5. enflammer
6. claquer
7. murmurer
8. frissonner
9. vibrer
10. résonner

* Example Sentences

- La porte grince. (The door creaks.)
- Je tremble de froid. (I tremble from cold.)
- Le feu embrase la forêt. (The fire sets the forest ablaze.)

* Conjugation Drills

** grincer

*** Present Tense

| Subject   | Conjugation |
|-----------+------------|
| je | |
| tu | |
| il/elle | |
| nous | |
| vous | |
| ils/elles | |

| Subject   | Conjugation |
|-----------+------------|
| je | |
| tu | |
| il/elle | |
| nous | |
| vous | |
| ils/elles | |

| Subject   | Conjugation |
|-----------+------------|
| je | |
| tu | |
| il/elle | |
